about_the_game:
Potion & Fortune

In Potion & Fortune, you take on the role of a gnome wizard who’s lost his powers and starts anew in a quaint town, using his wits and alchemy to make a name for himself. Craft unique potions from rare ingredients, uncover hidden recipes, and sell your concoctions to eager customers. Venture into enchanted forests and dark dungeons to hunt for ingredients, fending off monsters along the way. As you gather resources and experiment with brews, your magic grows stronger, and your staff can be upgraded to take on even fiercer foes!

Features:

  • Potion Crafting & Selling – Brew potions with diverse effects and sell them to the townsfolk. From simple remedies to powerful elixirs, each sale brings you closer to rediscovering your lost magic.

  • Ingredient Hunting & Monster Slaying – Collect ingredients across rich environments, battling monsters and discovering hidden spots brimming with mystical plants and minerals.

  • Upgrade Your Magic Staff – Customize and enhance your staff with elemental powers and special abilities to take on tougher enemies.

  • Engaging Storyline & Charming World – Explore a cozy yet mysterious town filled with quirky characters, exciting secrets, and opportunities for fortune.

Will you reclaim your powers and bring Potion & Fortune to the small town, or will you be lost in the endless pursuit of the perfect brew?

  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
